entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
